performs.from sentence:
Simulation on synthetic data
It can be seen that the proposed RankGAN performs more favourably against the compared methods .

achieves.from sentence: While MLE , PG - BLEU and SeqGAN tend to converge after 200 training epochs , the proposed RankGAN consistently improves the language generator and achieves relatively lower NLL score .

worth noting.from sentence: It is worth noting that the proposed RankGAN achieves better performance than that of PG - BLEU .

similarity.between: human - written poem and the machine - created one

estimate.from sentence:
Results on Chinese poems composition
Following the evaluation protocol in , we compute the BLEU - 2 score and estimate the similarity between the human - written poem and the machine - created one .

seen that.from sentence: It can be seen that the proposed Rank GAN performs more favourably compared to the state - of - the - art methods in terms of BLEU - 2 score .

in terms of.from sentence: RankGAN outperforms the compared method in terms of the human evaluation score .

RankGAN.from sentence:
Results on COCO image captions
RankGAN achieves better performance than the other methods in terms of different BLEU scores .

our model.from sentence: These examples show that our model is able to generate fluent , novel sentences that are not existing in the training set .

get.from sentence: As can be seen , the human - written sentences get the highest score comparing to the language models .

Among.from sentence: Among the GANs approaches , RankGAN receives better score than SeqGAN , which is consistent to the finding in the Chinese poem composition .

proposed method.from sentence:
Results on Shakespeare 's plays
As can be seen , the proposed method achieves consistently higher BLEU score than the other methods in terms of the different n-grams criteria .

proposed RankGAN.from sentence: The results indicate the proposed RankGAN is able to capture the transition pattern among the words , even if the training sentences are novel , delicate and complicated .
